splitFacet

  • splitFacet(h: Halfedge, g: Halfedge): boolean

  • Do the following operation:

    o----o o----o | \ |\
    | o => | \ o | / | \ / o----o o----o

    Parameters

    • h: Halfedge
    • g: Halfedge

    Returns boolean

surface

  • surface(): Surface

  • Inherited from SurfaceBuilder.surface

    Returns Surface

switchEdge

  • switchEdge(e0: Halfedge): boolean

  • Do the following:

    o o e1 /|\ e2o /
    / | \ /
    o | o => o-----o \ | / \ / e2 |/ e1o \ / o o

    Parameters

    • e0: Halfedge

    Returns boolean

triangulateFacet

  • triangulateFacet(start: Halfedge): void

  • Triangulate a facet using split_facet() (for non triangular facet)

    Parameters

    • start: Halfedge

    Returns void
